title: Track Introduction
blurb: Once upon a midnight dreary, while I pondered, weak and weary, over many a quaint and curious volume of forgotten lore, while I nodded, nearly napping, suddenly there came a tapping, as of someone gently rapping, rapping at my chamber door.  'Tis some visitor, I muttered, tapping at my chamber door.  Only this, and nothing more.
